resources.string: "The baroque styled Chateau built in 1728 as the home " "of the former ruling family of Waldeck and Pyrmont is now a museum still inhabited by " "Wittekind, Prince of Waldeck and Pyrmont."
"The Church was built in a simplistic baroque style " "from the years 1735 to 1787 and the interior contains a Rokoko stucco styled ceiling"

"The Mansion was built in 1740 for Major Rabe von Canstein and is considered a very good " "example of baroque architecture. In 1818 the house was owned by the city and used by the " "administration council."

"A small but charming baroque styled Café dedicated to Princess Emma, born in " "Chateau Arolsen and who later became the Queen of the Netherlands. The Café serves various " "beverages and cakes and breakfast in the morning hours."
"A Bar with Lounge & Garden serving gourmet burgers and various liquor specialties "

"Enjoy a complete feeling of wellbeing and relaxation is guaranteed in our luxurious " "Welcome Spa (2000 m²). In addition to offering a range of massages, beauty treatments and " "aroma therapy baths the spa also has a pool with a whirlpool, a large sauna centre with a " "Hammam, a salt crystal sauna, a panorama sauna, a bio sauna, wading pools, adventure " showers, a small fitness area and our gourmet Vital Bistrorante. "

"Egal ob aktive Bewegung bei unseren Aqua-Kursen, Entspannung pur bei einer wohltuenden " "Massage oder eine dosierte Portion Sonne unter einem der Solarien. Achten Sie auf unsere " "Event-Ankündigungen! Die beliebten Beauty-Tage in der Saunalandschaft verwöhnen Sie noch " "mehr."

"Oberhalb des Twistesees, eingebettet in die sanfte Hügellandschaft des Waldecker Landes " "und umgeben von der herrlichen Waldlandschaft Bad Arolsen, liegt unsere 9- Loch Golfanlage " "mit einem großzügig angelegten und für die Region einmaligen Trainingsareal."

"Die lautlose und umweltfreundliche Seilbahn zieht Sie für wenig Geld über den idyllischen " "Twistesee, für Anfänger mit 29 km/h bis 58 km/h für Könner. Sie brauchen nichts als Ihre " "Badehose. Wasserski und Schwimmweste werden kostenlos gestellt."
